title: Internet loses connection ONLY when I play league!!?
body: I don't know if this happens to anyone else but every time I play league, I always get the little yellow question mark next to my wifi icon. Everything else that's connected to my wifi is fine except for my computer. This only happens to my computer everytime I play league. If i disable and re-enable my connection, everything will work fine until it randomly disconnects again.

replies.body:
I've seen this a few times, and most of the time it's caused by some *very unique* network setups. Since there are a number of potential factors at play here, I'd recommend starting with ensuring your network settings are up to par with our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you encounter issues after finishing those steps.

I've been trying to add "TCP 5222 and 5223" but it always says "Invalid range of ports". Everything else applied perfectly tho.
I wouldn't worry about those ports too much unless you're getting disconnected from PvP.net specifically. Did those other steps cause any change in your connection at all?
